nodes.text: Kiirloor was a Wookiee settlement that was established on Cularin during the Clone Wars. The Wyrd wanted to destroy it, as it was too close to one of their bases, so they used a dark side artifact to try and make the extinct Cloud Mountain volcano erupt and destroy the settlement. The Wyrd were defeated by the Heroes of Cularin, but the settlement was badly damaged, so the Wookiees relocated it to a different area of Cularin.
